name: POV Doggystyle LoRA [1 MB]
description:
This is my first LoRA sex position - and it's for POV Doggystyle.

It's a very basic LoRA I suggest using this at 0.9-1.0 weight for best results.

Always add this prompt to activate it: <lora:POVDoggy:0.9>, 1boy, penis, doggystyle, from behind.

After that you can add other descriptive tags -

Examples

  1. pov hands, ass grab, deep skin (Good results)

  2. facing away, nude, implied sex (Good results)

  3. pov hands, spread anus, spread ass, deep skin, hands on ass (50/50 - Okay results.)

If you remove penis from the prompt - It will give it a deep penetration effect most of the time. I made this as a test before I start making more - It has some flaws but generally works very well.

It was trained on the NAI Model. I have no idea if this works on realistic models. Images were generated on Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix using the Orange Mix VAE.

Embeds and LoRAs used - Bad Prompt - Bea - Misty - Toga Himiko

Be sure to leave a review, comment and check out my other LoRAs - You might see something you like here.

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
